body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Jacob Boyer. Married to Elizabeth Galbreath Boyer in Henry County on June 24, 1852. Father of Josephine Boyer and Leslie N. Boyer. Married Eliza Brent Boyer. Father of William Boyer and Jacob Boyer. Owned Turner and one other enslaved person in Henry County in 1860. Household owned two additional enslaved persons in Henry County in 1860.
